meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>rot</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to rot</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: Remember the word 臭い, which means "stinky"? When something rots, it becomes stinky, and all <reading>くさ</reading>い.
